name: Clicker: Glad Valakas
description:
This game is about one of the most extraordinary streamers Runet, it is a clicker in which you have to stay by Glad Valakas. You have to earn DP for which you can improve rooms, voice accompaniment, as well as increase the production of DP. Good luck!

Features:

- Clicker

- Steam achievements

- Nice graphic

- This game was created using Clickteam Fusion 2.5

- Cheat mode : Y
